description: ff. 399. 225 x 155 mm. 19 lin. 29 Shaʻbān 1255 H. Autograph. Ziriklī, al-Aʻlām (1979), I, 259. The author's name appears on fol. 4b, line 2ff. of the present ms. The work is arranged in muqaddimāt and 3 kitābs. On fols. 399b-400b, approbations, including that of al-Bājūrī, d. 1276/1860. Incip.: الحمد لله الذى نطقت بوجوب وجوده جمىع الکائنات
author: Fīshāwī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad, active 19th century
alternative: Kitāb al-Ṭāliʼ al-saʻīd fī al-manṭiq al-ḥamīd
title: Hādhā Kitāb al-Ṭāliʼ al-saʻīd fī al-manṭiq al-ḥamīd
creator: Fīshāwī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad, active 19th century
subject: Logic
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
